comments.body: Changing this here doesn't mean that it will actually updated existing rows that were inserted AFTER the V2_1 migration has run. This only runs once on a database if it hasn't been run before.

Yes, this change is not very nice. I removed the `TimedOut` type, so I had to deserialize "TimedOut" constants to _something_ here. Again a case where this migration depending on external code/types is problematic.
 
My proposal is to leave this change here, and add a new migration that renames all "TimedOut" to "InvalidLedgerTime".
